Introduction

BOTOPASS was an eight-member South Korean girl group under WKS ENE and XX Entertainment. Their group name was a shortened version of "BOrn TO be PASSion".

They made their official debut on the 26th of August, 2020 with their first digital single album "Flamingo". Controversies involving their senior group led to not much attention being put on the group leading to one member Mihee joining the survival show, My Teenage Girl, and other members facing contractual changes.

On August 25, 2022, their agency announced they disbanded the group after Jiwon, Seoyoon, and Cui Xiang departed on the same day due to various situations. In addition, they will share the future activities of the other remaining members about new plans.
